short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Summarize any webpage using ChatGPT API

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you tired of sifting through endless articles and videos to find the key points? Our Chrome extension is here to help you become more efficient and informed in no time!

With just a click, our extension leverages the power of ChatGPT to provide you with concise and insightful summaries of any webpage or video content. Whether you're a student, a professional, or just someone who loves to stay informed, our tool is designed to save you time and enhance your productivity.

Key Features:
Instant Summaries: Get the gist of any article or video with a quick summary that highlights the most important information.

Customizable Prompts: Tailor the summarization process to your needs by setting your own prompts.

Seamless Integration: Easily access the extension from your browser toolbar and enjoy a smooth, user-friendly experience.

Say goodbye to information overload and hello to smarter browsing. Try our extension today and transform the way you consume content!

---
Feel free to adjust the description to better fit your style or specific features of your extension!
